text: Hi! Multi-language blogs are impossible to use in blog selectors as they show only the internal name which is the same for all language variants.

ie. `fields.json` has

```      {
        "name": "blog_id",
        "label": "Blog",
        "required": true,
        "locked": false,
        "type": "blog"
      },```
and when selecting a blog it shows eg.
• Some blog
• Some blog
• Some blog
and only via trial and error I can select the correct language version
